title: Reset Online Account Password
description: A customer has forgotten their password for the online portal and needs to reset it.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer's identity using their account number and security PIN.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully verifies the customer's identity.

tasks.description: Trigger a password reset link to be sent to the customer's registered email address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uses the tool to send the reset email.

tasks.description: Instruct the customer to check their email and follow the link to create a new password.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions to the customer.
